---
collection: patterns
title: Buttons
---

These are state patterns supplementing existing button classes.

<button class="p-button--neutral is-wide">Wide button</button>

```html
<button class="p-button--neutral is-wide">Wide button</button>
```

<button class="p-button--neutral is-large">Large button</button>

```html
<button class="p-button--neutral is-large">Large button</button>
```
